<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the scheduler should penalize instructions that are available to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// early due to a zero-latency dependence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55" lineLink="#a6fda5b03c9cb06d554d7368694ee9a56"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="#a6fda5b03c9cb06d554d7368694ee9a56">CheckEarlyAvail</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;check-early-avail&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This value is used to determine if a register class is a high pressure set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We compute the maximum number of registers needed and divided by the total</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// available. Then, we compare the result to this value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="#a896b704353a0944b794b7793550ccf96"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;float&gt;</a> <a href="#a896b704353a0944b794b7793550ccf96">RPThreshold</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;vliw-misched-reg-pressure&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(0.75f),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;High register pressure threhold.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a547811c189bc99f76bf3e59c8ac547d1">ResourceModel</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a4d9b7da4f22279749e353a8cfd4ad687">HazardRec</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Does this SU have a hazard within the current instruction group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The scheduler supports two modes of hazard recognition. The first is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ScheduleHazardRecognizer API. It is a fully general hazard recognizer that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// supports highly complicated in-order reservation tables</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (ScoreboardHazardRecognizer) and arbitrary target-specific logic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The second is a streamlined mechanism that checks for hazards based on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// simple counters that the scheduler itself maintains. It explicitly checks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for instruction dispatch limitations, including the number of micro-ops that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// can dispatch per cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TODO: Also check whether the SU must start a new group.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a7f64e612634009b7ced96fbf06f6b445"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a7f64e612634009b7ced96fbf06f6b445">ConvergingVLIWScheduler::VLIWSchedBoundary::releasePending</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the available queue is empty, it is safe to reset MinReadyCycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a82762ba9a6d9a67d70e532100f9512cb">Available</a>.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a52cf937a31f5a9dff56918b97ed9a94b">MinReadyCycle</a> = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;unsigned&gt;::max();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check to see if any of the pending instructions are ready to issue.  If</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check if the instruction changes the register pressure of a register in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// high pressure set. The function returns a negative value if the pressure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// decreases and a positive value is the pressure increases. If the instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// doesn&#39;t use a high pressure register or doesn&#39;t change the register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pressure, then return 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a72c1f9735ae80acb1e429fa095ce3739"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a72c1f9735ae80acb1e429fa095ce3739">ConvergingVLIWScheduler::pressureChange</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isBotUp) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pressurediff">PressureDiff</a> &amp;PD = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a187af70a733b698fbe59b50ff1fa0073">DAG</a>-&gt;getPressureDiff(SU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> : PD) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If resources are available for it, multiply the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chance of scheduling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a9b1bc7ac4c6a5eb2974a5fe039a629d3">Bot</a>.ResourceModel-&gt;isResourceAvailable(SU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IsAvailableAmt = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#ae92e52d0090af0f8abe764f84b20fd98">PriorityTwo</a> + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#aedc6b321add26cbefb719411e399115a">PriorityThree</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumNodesBlocking = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Q.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/readyqueue/#afe1bde7001d7b6a70198dc827f4a28e2">getID</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a8838d66fd452f7cdd09e825269ecbf1fa40f7f0675083aaa0ae6f43946859c03b">TopQID</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// How many SUs does it block from scheduling?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look at all of the successors of this node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Count the number of nodes that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this node is the sole unscheduled node for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a70cc4724751ac8752aacd038a455a1c9">Top</a>.isLatencyBound(SU))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> : SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#aab4a86c51e6b126c9c6ef58dbb574431">Succs</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a07cd4ba9b3cd1a7ff745d0238726dab6">isSingleUnscheduledPred</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getSUnit(), SU))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ++NumNodesBlocking;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Factor in reg pressure as a heuristic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a7b4721361efd8675d16257e7e8542bbe">IgnoreBBRegPressure</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Decrease priority by the amount that register pressure exceeds the limit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ResCount -= (Delta.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regpressuredelta/#aff9c3b403c6d4af795dd8be1c9612240">Excess</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pressurechange/#a1eef24878593ee0080b20b96ce3eb4c4">getUnitInc</a>() &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a34187a370b7c8eb6b6d180ac6faccf29">PriorityOne</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Decrease priority if register pressure exceeds the limit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ResCount -= (Delta.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regpressuredelta/#a277da5755f2b30ebcebdba51d0de1acf">CriticalMax</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pressurechange/#a1eef24878593ee0080b20b96ce3eb4c4">getUnitInc</a>() &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a34187a370b7c8eb6b6d180ac6faccf29">PriorityOne</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Decrease priority slightly if register pressure would increase over the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current maximum.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ResCount -= (Delta.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regpressuredelta/#a589e1a7e9a8a095d8d01ff8ba32b3d14">CurrentMax</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pressurechange/#a1eef24878593ee0080b20b96ce3eb4c4">getUnitInc</a>() &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#ae92e52d0090af0f8abe764f84b20fd98">PriorityTwo</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are register pressure issues, then we remove the value added for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the instruction being available. The rationale is that we really don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// want to schedule an instruction that causes a spill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsAvailableAmt &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a72c1f9735ae80acb1e429fa095ce3739">pressureChange</a>(SU, Q.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/readyqueue/#afe1bde7001d7b6a70198dc827f4a28e2">getID</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a8838d66fd452f7cdd09e825269ecbf1fa40f7f0675083aaa0ae6f43946859c03b">TopQID</a>) &gt; 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (Delta.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regpressuredelta/#aff9c3b403c6d4af795dd8be1c9612240">Excess</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pressurechange/#a1eef24878593ee0080b20b96ce3eb4c4">getUnitInc</a>() || Delta.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/regpressuredelta/#a277da5755f2b30ebcebdba51d0de1acf">CriticalMax</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pressurechange/#a1eef24878593ee0080b20b96ce3eb4c4">getUnitInc</a>() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ResCount -= IsAvailableAmt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (verbose) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tie breaker.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To avoid scheduling indeterminism, we need a tie breaker</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Pick the best candidate node from either the top or bottom queue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#adb98e755dacbd7d91a9910fe4dcea63c"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#adb98e755dacbd7d91a9910fe4dcea63c">ConvergingVLIWScheduler::pickNodeBidrectional</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;IsTopNode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Schedule as far as possible in the direction of no choice. This is most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// efficient, but also provides the best heuristics for CriticalPSets.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If either Q has a single candidate that provides the least increase in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Excess pressure, we can immediately schedule from that Q.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RegionCriticalPSets summarizes the pressure within the scheduled region and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// affects picking from either Q. If scheduling in one direction must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// increase pressure for one of the excess PSets, then schedule in that</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Update the scheduler&#39;s state after scheduling a node. This is the same node</span></CodeLine>
